PHRASE.LANG: This chic outfit displays an impressive radiance of blue on its clothing and from the sapphire on its cane. Bundle includes a jacket, cane, trousers, and shoes. [#Legal]
Le bleu de l'ensemble et de la pierre ornant la canne illuminent littéralement cette tenue. Le pack comprend une veste, une canne, un pantalon et des chaussures. [#Legal]
Von der Kleidung und dem Spazierstock dieses schicken Outfits geht ein beeindruckendes blaues Strahlen aus. Das Paket umfasst Jacke, Stock, Hose und Schuhe. [#Legal]
Tenuta chic, che irradia luce blu dai capi di vestiario e dallo zaffiro montato sul bastone. Il pacchetto include giacca, bastone, pantaloni e scarpe. [#Legal]
Este conjunto chic luce un azul radiante de impresión en el tejido, y en el zafiro del bastón. El conjunto incluye chaqueta, pantalones, zapatos y bastón. [#Legal]
놀라운 광채를 발산하는 푸른색 의상입니다. 사파이어로 장식된 지팡이와 함께 격조 높은 모습을 자랑하세요. 이 세트는 재킷, 지팡이, 바지, 그리고 구두를 포함합니다. [#Legal]
This chic outfit displays an impressive radiance of blue on its clothing and from the sapphire on its cane. Bundle includes a jacket, cane, pants, and shoes. [#Legal]
這套時髦的服裝和權杖上的藍寶石展現著令人讚嘆的耀眼藍光。服裝組包括件外套、權杖、褲子和鞋子。 [#Legal]
這套時髦的服裝和權杖上的藍寶石展現著令人讚嘆的耀眼藍光。服裝組包括件外套、權杖、褲子和鞋子。 [#Legal]
